title: Text Calculator
description: Create a simple calculator using only text input and output in the console.

steps.title: Step 1: Introduction
steps.description: Let's create a basic calculator that can add, subtract, multiply, and divide numbers. We'll take input from the user and display the result in the console.

steps.title: Step 2: User Input
steps.description: Ask the user to enter two numbers and the operation they want to perform (addition, subtraction, multiplication, or division).
steps.codeSnippet:
num1 = float(input('Enter the first number: '))
num2 = float(input('Enter the second number: '))
operation = input('Enter the operation (+, -, *, /): ')

steps.title: Step 3: Perform Calculation
steps.description: Based on the user's input, perform the corresponding calculation.

steps.title: Step 4: Display Result
steps.description: Print the result of the calculation to the console.
steps.codeSnippet:
if result is not None:
    print('Result:', result)
